name: resilient-llm
description: ResilientLLM is a resilient, unified LLM interface with in-built circuit breaker, token bucket rate limiting, caching, and adaptive retry with dynamic backoff support.

scripts.playground:react: npm link && cd examples/playground-react && npm link resilient-llm && RESILIENT_LLM_SOURCE=local npm run dev
scripts.playground:js: npm link && cd examples/playground-js && npm link resilient-llm && RESILIENT_LLM_SOURCE=local npm run dev
scripts.playground:next: npm link && cd examples/playground-nextjs && npm link resilient-llm && RESILIENT_LLM_SOURCE=local npm run dev
scripts.example:chat: npm link && cd examples/chat-basic && npm link resilient-llm && RESILIENT_LLM_SOURCE=local npm run dev
scripts.example:chat:npm: cd examples/chat-basic && npm install && npm run dev
